metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21440 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Generated Support Bundles contains private S/MIME and PGP keys if containing folder is not hidden. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.27 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.14 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
